post:
Hello guys, 
My name is Hassan and I'm here from ReverseHosts.com to offer you a special discount on our 512MB, 1GB, and 2GB RAM plans. These will be hosted with Calihop in San Diego, CA and with QuickPacket in Atlanta, GA. We have been around since September of 2012 and are always working on improving our services. These VPSs use OpenVZ and SolusVM. 
 
Test IPs:
San Diago, CA: 67.207.208.210
Atlanta, GA: 199.233.235.235
